item.title: SCOOP: Dems who derailed Al Green censure could be stripped of House committee roles
item.description: Rep. Andy Ogles said he intends to force a vote on a resolution to strip Democrats who derailed House floor proceedings from their committees.

item.title: Trump’s plan to house migrants at Guantanamo Bay facing major hurdles
item.description: The Trump administration is moving to house 30,000 migrants at Guantanamo Bay – though the plan is seeing a few bumps in its road to implementation

item.title: Trump says he 'felt very comfortable' during address to Congress, touts positive coverage from 'fake news'

item.title: 'Hamilton' star put on notice by Trump's Kennedy Center president after anti-GOP 'publicity stunt'
item.description: Kennedy Center President Ric Grenell slammed Broadway star Lin-Manuel Miranda after "Hamilton" was pulled from a planned production at the center.

item.title: New York City denied request FEMA return $80M in migrant funds
item.description: A federal judge blocked New York City’s request for President Donald Trump’s administration to return $80 million in FEMA funds allocated for migrant ...
